HotelElement.Name: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles

Description.Text: The Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles hotel is located in Paris' 14th arrondissement. Opposite Metro line 13, the hotel is 5 mins from the Montparnasse train station district and Versailles exhibition center on tram T3, and 20 mins from the Eiffel Tower and the Champs Elysees.

LE PATIO - Enjoy a selection of cold drinks, fruit juices, wines and aperitifs, and take the time to relax with your family or friends in the cozy atmosphere of the Novotel Suite bar. BOUTIQUE GOURMANDE - Take a break at the Boutique Gourmande: cooked dishes to reheat, sandwiches, cold dishes, desserts and drinks that you can enjoy in the comfort of your suite or at the bar. Self-service and open 24/7, a selection of delights awaits!.
